titleStmt.title: An answer to Mr. Fisher the Iesuite, his fiue propositions concerning Luther. By Mr. Rogers, that worthy Oxford diuine. VVith some passages also of the said Mr. Rogers with the said Mr. Fisher. Hereunto is annexed Mr. VV.C. his dialogue of the said argument, wherein is discouered Fishers folly
titleStmt.author: Rogers, Henry, ca. 1585-1658.

notesStmt.note: Place of publication conjectured by STC.
"A dialogue concerning this question, VVhere was your church before Luther and Caluin" by William Crashaw has separate dated title page; register and pagination are continuous.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
